maqras.text: Wo yi zhe zuo chengshi [mai jia] fashi,
Ni zai ci chengzhong shi bu shou yueshu de [gongke mai jia shi, ni zai ci chengzhong chengfa yisilan de diren shi wu zui de].
Yi fuqin [ru a dan shengren] ji suo sheng de houdai fashi,
wo que yi ba ren chuangzao yu xinlao zhong.
Nandao ta yiwei jue meiyou ren neng guanzhi ta ma?
Ta [zikua de] shuo:“Wo yi huihuole daliang caifu!”
Nandao ta yiwei meiyou ren neng kanjian ta ma?
Nandao wo meiyou wei ta chuangzao liang zhi yanjing,
yitiao shetou he liang pian zuichun,
bing zhishi ta [shan yu e] liang tiao mingdao ma?
Dan ta meiyou nuli zou shangpolu.
Ni zen neng zhidao shangpolu shi shenme?
Na jiushi shifang nuli,
huo zai jihuang ri jieji qinqi de gu'er,
huo qiongkun de pinmin,
dan ta yinggai shi xinshi, yi jianren quanmian, yi ci min hu li.
Zhexie ren shi youshou bian de ren [leyuan de jumin].
Fan bu xinyang wo de qishi zhe, tamen shi zuoshou bian de ren [huo yu de fanren].
Tamen jiang bei guan zai huo yu li.
Yi taiyang ji qi guanghui fashi,
yi zhuisui taiyang shi de yueliang fashi,
yi xianlu taiyang guang shi de baizhou fashi,
yi yangai taiyang shi de heiye fashi,
yi tian ji qi jianzao zhe [an la] fashi,
yi dadi ji qi shenzhan zhe [an la] fashi,
yi linghun ji shi qi wanshan zhe [an la] fashi,
ta [an la] yi ba shan e qishi ta.
Fan jinghua zishen zhe [ru shuncong an la, zunxing yisilan jiao jiaoyi jiaogui] que yi chenggong;
fan fuhua zishen zhe [ru weibei an la, bu zunxing yisilan jiao jiaoyi jiaogui] que yi shibai.
Sa mu de ren yin panni er fouren [tamen de shizhe].
Dangshi, tamen zhong zui buxing zhe shang qian lai [sha si na mu tuo],
an la de shizhe [sa li ha shengren] dui tamen shuo:“Zhe shi an la de mu tuo,[nimen buyao shanghai ta], nimen rang ta ziyou yinshui ba!”
Dan tamen fouren ta [sa li ha shengren], bing shahaile na mu tuo, suoyi, tamen de zhuyin tamen de zui'e huimiele tamen, bing ba tamen quanbu [ru fu ren yu qiongren, qiang zhe yu ruozhe] huimiele.
Ta [an la] shi wuxu gulu houguo de.
Yi yangai [taiyang] shi de heiye fashi,
yi xianlu [taiyang guang] shi de baizhou fashi,
yi chuangzao nanxing he nuxing de zhu [an la] fashi,
nimen de xingwei que shi butong de [ge ren you ge ren de fendou mubiao].
Zhiyu shishe, jingwei an la,
bing quexin zhi shan zhe,
wo jiang shi ta rongyi zunxing shandao.
Zhiyu linse, ziman wu qiu,
bing fouren zhi shan zhe,
wo jiang shi ta rongyi bu ru xiedao.
Dang ta miewang shi, ta de caifu dui ta jiang hao wu yichu.
Wo que you yindao de zeren.
Houshi he jinshi jun gui wo zhangguan.
Suoyi, wo jinggao nimen yi zhong [huo yu li] ranshao de liehuo,
zhiyou zui buxing zhe cai hui jinru qizhong,
yinwei ta [zui buxing zhe] fouren zhenli bing beiqi [zhenli].
Jingwei zhe jiang yuanli ta [ranshao de liehuo],
yinwei ta [jingwei zhe] wei jinghua zishen er [wei an la zhi dao] shiyong ziji de caifu,
ta meiyou qiwang renhe ren jiyu huibao,
zhi weile xunqiu ta de zhigao zhu [an la] de xiyue.
Ta [jinru leyuan shi] bi jiang xiyue.
Yi shangwu [taiyang sheng qi hou] fashi,
yi jijing shi de heiye fashi,
ni [mu sheng] de zhu ji meiyou diuqi ni, ye meiyou yuanhen ni [zhu].
Houshi dui ni dique bi jinshi hao.
Ni de zhu bi jiang shangci ni, ni jiang yinci er xiyue.
Nandao ta [an la] meiyou faxian ni [mu sheng] shi gu'er er ci gei ni bihu ma?
Nandao ta meiyou faxian ni paihuai qitu er yindao ni ma?
Nandao ta meiyou faxian ni pinqiong er shi ni fuyu ma?
Yinci, ni buyao nuedai gu'er,
ni buyao chitui qiqiu zhe,
ni dang xuanyang ni de zhu de enhui.
